mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ROOM VALUES( ROOM_NO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{room_name}, '사진', #{room_type}, #{room_deposit}, #{room_price}, #{room_extent}, #{room_addr}, #{room_kind}, #{room_structure}, #{room_floor}, SYSDATE, TO_DATE(#{room_cpdate}, 'yyyy/MM/dd'), TO_DATE(#{room_avdate}, 'yyyy/MM/dd'), #{room_detail}, #{room_id})

INSERT INTO ROOM VALUES( ROOM_NO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{room_name}, '사진', #{room_type}, '0', #{room_price}, #{room_extent}, #{room_addr}, #{room_kind}, #{room_structure}, #{room_floor}, SYSDATE, TO_DATE(#{room_cpdate}, 'yyyy/MM/dd'), TO_DATE(#{room_avdate}, 'yyyy/MM/dd'), #{room_detail}, #{room_id})
